New study shows reducing pollution has health benefits. It’s up to the government to take the right lessons
Drones deployed, internet suspended: Bareilly on alert ahead of Friday prayers - Top developments
description: Bareilly suspended internet services and tightened security ahead of Friday prayers, fearing unrest after last week's clashes over an 'I Love Muhammad' row. Authorities placed prominent leaders like Chandrashekhar Azad under house arrest to prevent their visit. The administration is also surveying properties for demolition, targeting alleged rioters and their supporters.

Yankees’ $80M MVP poised to hit free agency with Pete Alonso: report
description: New York baseball faces a pivotal 2025 offseason as star sluggers Cody Bellinger (Yankees) and Pete Alonso (Mets) are set to enter free agency. Both players, with MVP-caliber seasons, are opting out of current deals seeking massive contracts. Their decisions will trigger intense bidding wars, profoundly impacting the Yankees' lineup and the Mets' core, potentially reshaping MLB's power dynamics.

title: MP: Tractor-trolley overturns in pond during Durga idol immersion; 11 drown
description: Eleven people, mostly teenagers, drowned in a pond in MP's Khandwa district when a tractor-trolley carrying Durga idol immersion devotees overturned on Vijayadashami. The vehicle lost balance and toppled into the water, despite a warning to the driver. Seven females and eight minors were among the deceased in the tragic accident.

title: Committee on AI comprising health authorities, academic experts formed
Tension in Bareilly: Drones are up ahead of Friday prayer; internet shut down
description: Bareilly suspended internet services, including mobile data and broadband, from October 2 to October 4, fearing unrest during Friday prayers. This precaution follows last week's clashes over an 'I Love Muhammad' procession, which led to over 80 arrests, including prominent cleric Tauqeer Raza Khan. Security remains heavily deployed across the division.

Road to Karachi is through Sir Creek: Rajnath to Pak; warns against military build-up
description: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh issued a stern warning to Pakistan regarding its military build-up near the sensitive Sir Creek region, threatening a strong response that would alter the area's history and geography. He also revealed details of "Operation Sindoor," where India successfully countered Pakistani attempts to penetrate its borders, emphasizing India's targeted fight against terrorism while showing restraint.

Despite being trolled over Cardi B's pregnancy and Nicki Minaj's controversial remarks, Diggs used Instagram to showcase his fashion and a song, signaling his focus on the upcoming season.

title: Trump’s campus compact: Top US universities under pressure; academic freedom at risk
description: The Trump administration has urged nine top US universities, including UT Austin and MIT, to sign a “Compact for Academic Excellence in Higher Education” to secure priority access to federal funding. The compact demands tuition freezes, limits on international students, bans on DEI policies, and restrictions on political expression. Universities face funding risks if they refuse, raising concerns about academic freedom and institutional governance under new federal conditions.

The region seeks resolution for its demands.

title: 'Lost balance': How a single misstep turned fatal during Durga idol immersion in MP; 11 dead

Hair pulled, slapped: Woman beats mother-in-law in Punjab; grandson films assault
description: A Gurdaspur woman, Harjeet Kaur, brutally assaulted her elderly mother-in-law, Gurbhajan Kaur, over a property dispute, captured in a viral video by her grandson. The Punjab State Commission for Women initiated an investigation, but the victim declined to press charges, stating it was a family matter. This disturbing incident has sparked widespread outrage.

title: Chiefs' Heiress Gracie Hunt shares life of big games and heartfelt moments
description: Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt experienced an unforgettable September, seamlessly blending high-stakes NFL games, international travel, and cherished personal moments. Despite a demanding schedule, she embraced every experience with gratitude, prioritizing connections with her boyfriend, family, and friends. Her journey exemplifies balancing professional ambition with heartfelt personal experiences, showcasing how intentionality transforms a busy life into a meaningful one.

title: US govt shutdown, round two: How Trump’s last standoff unfolded — What comes next
description: President Trump's government shutdown has plunged the US into crisis, with mass furloughs and imminent layoffs as he aims to reshape federal power and punish Democrats. This standoff, echoing 2018-19 but potentially more severe, sees Democrats demanding healthcare subsidies while Republicans prioritize reopening government, risking prolonged disruption and political backlash.

title: US govt shuts down: Embassy in India gives update; X account won’t be updated until…
description: The US government has shut down for the first time in nearly seven years after Republicans and Democrats failed to agree on federal funding. This halt means "non-essential" services like visa processing and national parks close, while "essential" workers continue without pay. The US Embassy in India also announced reduced updates, except for urgent safety information.

title: Visa fee hike: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says ‘great start, but $100,000 is expensive’
description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang supports President Trump's H-1B visa program overhaul but warns the new $100,000 application fee is prohibitively expensive. He cautions it could deter foreign talent and drive tech investment away from the US, disadvantaging startups. Huang emphasizes that attracting the brightest minds is crucial for America's future success.
